context_bundle.summary: Two-Phase Commit (2PC) protocol for atomic distributed transactions: Phase 1 (prepare/vote), Phase 2 (commit/abort). Coordinator asks all participants to prepare, if all vote yes commits, if any votes no aborts. Blocking protocol with coordinator as single point of failure.

onboarding.quick_start: 2PC: Phase 1: Coordinator sends PREPARE to all participants, each responds VOTE_COMMIT or VOTE_ABORT. Phase 2: If all VOTE_COMMIT, coordinator sends COMMIT, else sends ABORT. Trade-off: Strong consistency but blocks during network partition.
common_patterns: Timeout handling: Abort if participant unreachable
